Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Hermes Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone! I like this phone. Is very easy to use and your configuration is quickly! I a good inversion

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Maxine
Reviews.Content: My fault for not researching enough on dual/quad bands before purchasing this item.That being said..it was as advertised.This is a dual band and i wanted a quad band.Phone worked well as promised.I would encourage prospective purchasers to do their research  to ensure they get what they want especially if product is to be used abroad.Amazon did nothing wrong though..Good delivery time and phone worked very well, if only on one phone company in my country.Would recommend

Reviews.Title: Network code
Reviews.Author: joyce kamili
Reviews.Content: l like it because it is in the desire of my heart. Now the problem of this phone is the network, since the time l bought it is not working until now. So l need the network code from you, l have tried to go to the different cafes but no solution, so they told me to contact you over this problem. Yours in Christ.

Reviews.Title: Bought for use for my MOM
Reviews.Author: Sailendra Karki
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to send home for my mom. She could not use it with international sim card. She spent more money trying to fix that. You should not label your phone unlocked GSM if it is  actually NOT.  Very Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: None of the phones worked, I have  made several attempts to get help , but to no avail. I just lost my funds for these .
Reviews.Author: Dorcas Thomas
Reviews.Content: The 3 phones did not work. It staed that they were "Unlocked dual band". I could not connect to their network

Reviews.Title: Sells fake items
Reviews.Author: Abe
Reviews.Content: I am sure this seller knows that he is selling crap. Even nokia could not acknowledge the engine in this item. Your wrong doing will definitely catch up with you.

ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Asha 201 Black Keyboard Unlocked GSM DualBand Bar Cell Phone
